title: pings not working properly
body: ive found that quite often this patch i will ping something (missing) but the game will choose a different ping (danger) for no reason. i was watch meteos stream and it seemed like the same thing was happening to him. is anyone else having these issues?

replies.body: That's a new one on me. I'd recommend running a client repair, and if that doesn't help submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
